bug.author: kellyamanda
bug.summary: st.multiselect should convert non-iterables to iterable
bug.description: This doesn't work: st.multiselect('Add one', ['Abe', 'Barry', 'Cindy', 'Dave'], default='Dave') # default is a str This works: st.multiselect('Add one', ['Abe', 'Barry', 'Cindy', 'Dave'], default=['Dave']) # default is a list We should check if default is not iterable, and convert to list(default) if needed.
